title: Community Cinema presented by ITVS
name: Community Cinema presented by ITVS
description: FREE monthly documentary screenings followed by activities featuring poets, professors, experts, and maybe the filmmakers themselves. ITVS, the co-presenter of PBS' Independent Lens, presents previews of Independent Lens films shown from September to May followed by lively panel discussions, performances, and other activities that connect communities with relevant organizations, resources and opportunities to get involved in some of today's key social issues.
